title: Xbox/Bethesda Deal Official, Some Games Exclusive - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.09.21
description:
Gary and Greg delve into the reality of Xbox owning Bethesda.

00:00:00 - Start
00:06:00 - Housekeeping
Godzilla In Review starts today!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mick @DaNanoBiologist Abrahamson, Black Jack, & Trent Berrie
The Roper Report   -
00:07:10 - Xbox Buys Bethesda
00:27:02 - COD About to go BOOM?  Steven T. Wright @ GameSpot
00:31:50 - Fortnite getting its first SIngle Player Mode, Matt Purslow @ IGN
00:36:45 - Apex on Switch Runs at 30, Emma Kent @ Eurogamer
00:40:55 - Walt Williams Hired at Insom, Eddie @ GameSpot
00:43:10 - Hope for TLOU Factions, Eddie AGAIN
00:46:00 -  Ad
00:49:00 - Out today
00:52:50 - Squad Up:Lal (PSN and PC) - lallysup
 00:55:52 - ONE OF THEM ROTATIN’ SEGMENTS (This is optional) PARAGON LIVES! Dean @ GamesBeat
00:57:40 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Blessing and Janet Garcia
